alert.note: Alert for Addison; Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 2:18PM EDT until July 07 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Essex County in northern New York... Southwestern Addison County in central Vermont... Northwestern Rutland County in southern Vermont... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 218 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chilson, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Crown Point, Cornwall, Sudbury, Weybridge, Salisbury, Orwell, Whiting, New Haven, Shoreham, Crown Point Center, Brandon, Leicester, Pittsford, Bridport, Hubbardton, Bristol, Benson, Addison, and Waltham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
